page.title: 20CLUBS IN IGHTHAM
page.content:
We were able to discover details of five of the many societies and clubs in Ightham:
Gramophone Society; Meets every third Tuesday in the month. There are about 30 members. Discusses classical music.
Ightham Players; A group of amateur actors of all ages and interests who like to stage two plays each year in the Village Hall.
Women's Institute; Meet on the 2nd Tuesday of each month.
Historical Society; Interested in local history and preserving places of interest.
W.R.V.S.; Help local old people and people with personal troubles.
